block_quote.content: Mmerɛ a atwam no, na Onyankopɔn nam akwan ahodoɔ bebree so fa adiyifoɔ so kasa kyerɛ yɛn mpanimfoɔ.
Nanso, mmerɛ a ɛdi akyire no deɛ, ɔnam ne Ba no so akasa akyerɛ yɛn. Ɔno na Onyankopɔn nam ne so bɔɔ ewiase. Na ɔno na Onyankopɔn ayi no sɛ awieeɛ no, nneɛma nyinaa bɛyɛ ne dea.

Ɔnam hyerɛn a Onyankopɔn animuonyam hyerɛn no so hran. Ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn sɛso pɛpɛɛpɛ, na ɔde nʼasɛm a tumi wɔ mu no sɔ ewiase mu. Ɔtee nnipa ho firii wɔn bɔne mu wieeɛ no, ɔtenaa Otumfoɔ Onyankopɔn nifa so wɔ ɔsoro.
Ɛno enti, ɔyɛɛ kɛse sene abɔfoɔ no, ɛfiri sɛ, edin a Onyankopɔn de too no no yɛ kɛse sene wɔn deɛ no.
Ɛfiri sɛ, Onyankopɔn nso anka ankyerɛ nʼabɔfoɔ no mu biara sɛ,
“Woyɛ me Ba;
na ɛnnɛ, mayɛ wʼAgya.”
Ɛnna wanka ankyerɛ ɔbɔfoɔ biara sɛ,
“Mɛyɛ wʼAgya na wayɛ me Ba.”
Ɛberɛ a Onyankopɔn pɛɛ sɛ ɔsoma nʼabakan no ba ewiase no, ɔsane kaa sɛ,
“Ɛsɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn abɔfoɔ nyinaa som no.”
Asɛm a Onyankopɔn ka faa abɔfoɔ no ho ne sɛ,
“Onyankopɔn soma nʼabɔfoɔ sɛ mframa,
na ɔsoma nʼasomfoɔ sɛ gyadɛreeɛ.”
Na ɛfa Ɔba no ho no, Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ,
“Ao, Onyankopɔn, wʼahennwa bɛtena hɔ daa nyinaa;
wʼAhennie yɛ atɛntenenee.
Wodɔ tenenee, na wokyiri bɔne,
ɛno enti, Onyankopɔn wo Onyankopɔn de wo asi wo mfɛfoɔ so,
na ɔde anigyeɛ ngo asra wo.”
Onyankopɔn sane kaa sɛ,
“Mfitiaseɛ no wotoo asase fapem,
na ɔsoro yɛ wo nsa ano adwuma.
Ne nyinaa bɛtwam na wo deɛ wobɛtena hɔ daa;
wɔbɛtete sɛ atadeɛ.
Wɔbɛbobɔ no sɛ ntoma;
na wɔbɛsesa no sɛ ntadeɛ.
Nanso, wote sɛdeɛ woteɛ,
na wo mfeɛ to rentwa da.”
Onyankopɔn anka ankyerɛ nʼabɔfoɔ no sɛ,
“Montena me nifa so
kɔsi sɛ mede mo atamfoɔ bɛyɛ
mo nan ntiasoɔ.”
Sɛ saa a, na abɔfoɔ no yɛ dɛn? Wɔn nyinaa yɛ ahonhom a wɔsom Onyankopɔn na ɔsoma wɔn ma wɔkɔboa wɔn a wɔrehwehwɛ nkwagyeɛ no.
Yei enti na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛsɔ nokorɛ a yɛate no mu denden sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a, biribi rentu yɛn aso.
Nsɛm a abɔfoɔ no kaeɛ no yɛ nokorɛ enti obiara a wanni so no nyaa asotwe a ɛfata no.
Na sɛ yɛantie saa nkwagyesɛm yi a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yɛatumi adwane? Awurade no ankasa na ɔdii ɛkan kaa saa nkwagyeɛ yi ho asɛm na wɔn a wɔtiee no no, ama yɛahunu sɛ ɛyɛ nokorɛ.
Saa ɛberɛ korɔ no ara mu Onyankopɔn nam ne nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ne nʼanwanwadwuma so dii ho adanseɛ. Bio, ɔkyɛɛ Honhom Kronkron no sɛdeɛ ɔpɛ.
Onyankopɔn amma abɔfoɔ anni ewiase a na wayɛ nʼadwene sɛ ɔrebɛbɔ no so; saa ewiase a yɛka ho asɛm no.
Na mmom, wɔaka no Atwerɛsɛm no mu baabi sɛ:
“Onipa ne hwan a wokae no;
na onipa ba nso ne hwan a wʼani ku ne ho?
Wobɔɔ no maa ɔyɛɛ akumaa kakra sene abɔfoɔ;
na wode wʼanimuonyam ne anidie abɔ no abotire,
sɛ ɔnni nneɛma nyinaa so.”
Ɛka sɛ Onyankopɔn bɔɔ onipa sɛ “nneɛma nyinaa sodifoɔ.” Yei kyerɛ sɛ biribiara nni hɔ a wɔamfa anhyɛ nʼase. Nanso, seesei yɛnya nhunuu sɛ onipa di nneɛma nyinaa so.
Na mmom, yɛhunu Yesu! Mmerɛ tiawa bi, wɔbrɛɛ no ase sene abɔfoɔ, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a, Onyankopɔn adom enti, ɔbɛwu ama nnipa nyinaa. Owuo a ɔwuiɛ no enti, Onyankopɔn de animuonyam abotire abɔ no.

Onyankopɔn na ɔbɔɔ nneɛma nyinaa, na ɔwɔ tumi sɛ ɔyɛ biribiara. Ne saa enti, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ ne pɛ sɛ ɔde ne mma nyinaa bɛba nʼanimuonyam mu no, ɔmaa Agyenkwa no faa amanehunu mu sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a, ne mma no nsa bɛka nkwagyeɛ a ɛyɛ pɛ no. Ɛfiri sɛ, Yesu nko ara ne Onipa a ɔbɛtumi adi wɔn anim akɔ nkwagyeɛ mu.
Ɔma nnipa yɛ kronkron firi wɔn bɔne mu. Na ɔne wɔn a wayɛ wɔn kronkron no nyinaa wɔ Agya baako. Ɛno enti na Yesu mfɛre sɛ ɔfrɛ wɔn anuanom no.
Ɔka sɛ,
“Mɛka wo ho asɛm akyerɛ me nuanom,
mɛkamfo wo wɔ wɔn a wɔahyia hɔ no nyinaa anim.”
Ɔsane ka bio sɛ,
“Mede me ho bɛto Onyankopɔn so.”
Na ɔno nso ka sɛ,
“Mma a Onyankopɔn de wɔn ama me no nie.”
Esiane sɛ mma no wɔ honam ne mogya enti, Yesu nso baa onipa tebea mu sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a ɔnam ne wuo no so bɛsɛe ɔbonsam a ɔkura owuo tumi no ahoɔden.
Na ɔnam so agye wɔn a ɛsiane sɛ wɔsuro owuo enti, wɔn asetena mu nyinaa, wɔayɛ nkoa no.
Ɛyɛ nokorɛ turodoo sɛ ɛnyɛ abɔfoɔ na ɔboa wɔn. Na mmom, sɛdeɛ Atwerɛsɛm no ka no, “Ɔboa Abraham asefoɔ.”
Yei kyerɛ sɛ, ɛkwan biara so no, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔyɛ sɛ ne nuanom sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a, ɔbɛyɛ wɔn nokwafoɔ ne mmɔborɔhunufoɔ Ɔsɔfopanin wɔ Onyankopɔn anim, na ɛnam so ma wɔde nnipa bɔne akyɛ wɔn.
Enti afei, ɔbɛtumi aboa wɔn a wɔasɔ wɔn ahwɛ ɛfiri sɛ, ɔno ankasa wɔsɔɔ no hwɛeɛ maa ɔhunuu amane.
Me nuanom wɔ Kristo mu a Onyankopɔn afrɛ mo, monnwene Yesu a Onyankopɔn somaa no maa ɔbɛyɛɛ Ɔsɔfopanin wɔ gyidie a yɛka ho asɛm no ho.
Na ɔdii Onyankopɔn a ɔyii no sɛ ɔnyɛ saa adwuma yi no nokorɛ sɛdeɛ Mose nso dii nokorɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn fie no.
Onipa a ɔsi efie nya animuonyam sene efie no ankasa.
Saa ara na ɛteɛ; ɛsɛ sɛ Yesu nya animuonyam sene Mose. Efie biara, obi na ɔsiiɛ. Na Onyankopɔn nso na wabɔ nneɛma nyinaa.
Mose dii Onyankopɔn nokorɛ sɛ ɔsomfoɔ wɔ ne fie na ɔkaa nsɛm a Onyankopɔn bɛka daakye no nyinaa.
Nanso Kristo deɛ, ɔdi nokorɛ sɛ Ɔba a ɔhwɛ Onyankopɔn fie so. Sɛ yɛma yɛn bo yɛ duru na yɛwɔ gyidie wɔ yɛn anidasoɔ mu a, na yɛyɛ ne fiefoɔ.
Enti Honhom Kronkron no ka sɛ,
“Sɛ ɛnnɛ mote Onyankopɔn nne a,
monnyɛ asoɔden
te sɛ deɛ moyɛɛ ɛberɛ a mosɔre tiaa Onyankopɔn no;
sɛdeɛ moyɛɛ da a na mowɔ ɛserɛ so a mosɔɔ no hwɛeɛ no.
Ɛhɔ no, mo mpanimfoɔ sɔɔ no hwɛeɛ,
nanso wɔhunuu deɛ meyɛɛ no mfeɛ aduanan mu.
Esiane saa enti, me bo fuu saa nnipa no kaa sɛ,
‘Wɔyɛ nnipa a wɔn akoma amane afiri me ho,
na wɔanhunu mʼakwan.’
Ɛno enti mekaa ntam wɔ mʼabufuo mu sɛ,
‘Wɔrenhyɛne mʼahomegyeɛ mu da.’ ”
Me nuanom monhwɛ yie na mo mu bi annya akoma bɔne a ɔrennye Onyankopɔn nni na ɛbɛma watwe ne ho afiri Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ no ho.
Na mmom, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a bɔne rennaadaa mo mu bi na wɔnyɛ asoɔden enti, da biara mommoaboa mo ho mo ho ɛberɛ a asɛm “Ɛnnɛ” a ɛwɔ Atwerɛsɛm mu no fa yɛn ho no.
Na sɛ yɛsɔ gyidie a yɛwɔ no mu denden sɛdeɛ yɛde firi ahyɛaseɛ no a, na yɛyɛ Kristo fafafoɔ.
Atwerɛsɛm no ka sɛ,
“Sɛ ɛnnɛ mote Onyankopɔn nne a,
monnyɛ asoɔden
te sɛ deɛ moyɛɛ ɛberɛ a mosɔre tiaa Onyankopɔn no.”
Ɛhefoɔ na wɔtee Onyankopɔn nne na wɔsɔre tiaa no no? Nnipa a Mose dii wɔn anim firi Misraim no nyinaa.
Ɛhefoɔ na Onyankopɔn bo fuu wɔn mfirinhyia aduanan no? Nnipa a wɔyɛɛ bɔne na wɔtete hwe wuwuu wɔ ɛserɛ so no.
Ɛberɛ a Onyankopɔn kaa ntam sɛ, “Wɔremma me home mu da” no, na ɔreka akyerɛ ɛhefoɔ? Na ɔreka akyerɛ wɔn a wɔyɛɛ asoɔden no.
Afei, yɛhunu sɛ wɔantumi ankɔ home no mu, ɛfiri sɛ, wɔannye anni.
Afei, ɛsiane sɛ bɔhyɛ a ɛfa ne mu home da so wɔ hɔ enti, momma yɛnhwɛ yie na mo mu bi antɔ sini wɔ mu.
Ɛfiri sɛ wɔaka Asɛmpa no akyerɛ yɛn sɛdeɛ wɔka kyerɛ wɔn no. Nanso, wɔammu asɛm a wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn no, ɛfiri sɛ, wɔn a wɔtiee no no annye anni.
Na yɛn a yɛagye adi no nko ara na yɛkɔ saa home no mu
sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn aka sɛ, “Enti mefiri mʼabufuo mu ka ntam sɛ,
‘Wɔrenhyɛne asase a anka mede wɔn rekɔ mu no da.’ ”
Ɔkaa saa asɛm yi deɛ, nanso ɛfiri ɛberɛ a ɔbɔɔ ewiase no, na wawie ɔhome dwumadie no dada.
Na Atwerɛsɛm no mu baabi wɔka biribi fa da a ɛtɔ so nson no ho sɛ, “Ɛda a ɛtɔ so nson no, Onyankopɔn home firii ne nnwuma nyinaa mu.”
Wɔkaa saa asɛm korɔ yi ara bio sɛ, “Wɔrenhyɛne asase a anka mede wɔn rekɔ mu no da.”
Wɔn a wɔdii ɛkan tee Asɛmpa no annya saa ahome no, ɛfiri sɛ, wɔannye anni. Afoforɔ bi nso wɔ hɔ a wama wɔn ɛkwan sɛ wɔnnya ahome no.
Enti Onyankopɔn aka sɛ wayi ɛda bi ato hɔ a wɔfrɛ no “Ɛnnɛ.” Mfeɛ bebree akyi no, ɔnam Dawid so kaa wɔ Atwerɛsɛm no mu sɛ,
“Ɛnnɛ, sɛ mote Onyankopɔn nne a
mommpirim mo akoma.”
Sɛ Yosua dii nnipa no anim de wɔn kɔɔ Onyankopɔn home mu a, anka akyire no Onyankopɔn anka da foforɔ ho asɛm.
Sɛdeɛ ɛte yi, ɔhome da so wɔ hɔ ma Onyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn homee da a ɛtɔ so nson no.
Obiara a ɔbɛhome wɔ Onyankopɔn mu no bɛhome afiri nʼankasa ne nnwuma mu, sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn home firii ne nnwuma mu no.
Enti, momma yɛmmɔ yɛn ho mmɔden na yɛatumi akɔ Onyankopɔn home mu. Ɛnsɛ sɛ yɛn mu bi yɛ asoɔden sɛdeɛ wɔyɛɛ asoɔden a enti wɔankɔ mu no.
Onyankopɔn asɛm
yɛ nkwa, na tumi wɔ mu. Ɛyɛ nnam sene sekan anofanu. Ɛhwire mu kɔsi sɛ ɛpaapae honhom ne ɔkra, apɔ ne ɛhon mu. Ɛda yɛn akoma mu ne yɛn adwene mu nsusuiɛ nyinaa adi.
Biribiara nni hɔ a wɔde sie Onyankopɔn ma ɛyɛ yie. Abɔdeɛ mu biribiara da nʼanim na ɔno na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛbu yɛn ho akonta kyerɛ no.
Ɛno enti, momma yɛnsɔ gyidie a yɛka ho asɛm no mu den. Ɛfiri sɛ yɛwɔ Ɔsɔfopanin kɛseɛ wɔ Onyankopɔn anim.
Yɛnni sɔfopanin bi a ɔntumi nhwɛ yɛn mmerɛyɛ ho nhunu yɛn mmɔbɔ. Yɛwɔ obi a wɔasɔ no ahwɛ akwan ahodoɔ nyinaa so sɛ yɛn ara, nanso wanyɛ bɔne.
Momma yɛnsi yɛn bo na yɛmmra
Onyankopɔn ahennwa a adom wɔ mu no anim, na ɛno na ɛbɛma yɛanya ahummɔborɔ ne adom a ɛbɛboa yɛn ɛberɛ a ɛsɛ mu.

note.content: Sɛdeɛ wɔrewura Kanaan akɔgye home a gyidie de ba no, saa ara na nkwagyeɛ nso teɛ.
Yesu na ɔbɛyii Onyankopɔn ho nokwasɛm adi (Asɛm Kronkron no. Yoh 1.1,14)
Ɛsiane sɛ Kristo yɛn Sɔfopanin ahyia sɔhwɛ enti, wasiesie ne ho sɛ, sɛ yɛnya sɔhwɛ biara a, ɔde ahummɔborɔ bɛboa yɛn. (2.10)

block_quote.content: Wɔyi Ɔsɔfopanin biara firi nnipa bi mu na wasi wɔn ananmu de wɔn akyɛdeɛ ne wɔn bɔne ho afɔdeɛ asom Onyankopɔn.
Esiane sɛ nʼankasa yɛ mmerɛ akwan ahodoɔ pii so no enti, ɔtumi to ne bo ase ma wɔn a wɔnnim na wɔyɛ mfomsoɔ no.
Ne mmerɛyɛ enti, sɛ ɔrebɔ bɔne ho afɔdeɛ a, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔbɔ ma ne ho ne afoforɔ nso.
Obiara ntumi nyi ne ho mfa nhyɛ ne ho animuonyam
sɛ ɔyɛ Ɔsɔfopanin. Onyankopɔn frɛ nko na onipa nam so bɛyɛ Ɔsɔfopanin sɛdeɛ wɔfrɛɛ Aaron no.
Saa ara nso na Kristo annye anto ne ho so sɛ ɔyɛ Ɔsɔfopanin amfa anhyɛ ne ho animuonyam. Na mmom, Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ,
“Woyɛ me Ba:
ɛnnɛ, mayɛ wʼAgya.”
Ɔsane kaa wɔ baabi foforɔ sɛ,
“Wobɛyɛ ɔsɔfoɔ akɔsi daa
sɛdeɛ Melkisedek asɔfokwan nhyehyɛeɛ te no.”

Yesu baa ɔhonam mu wɔ asase so no, ɔbɔɔ mpaeɛ nam nkotosrɛ so de nʼabisadeɛ too Onyankopɔn a ɔbɛtumi agye no afiri owuo mu no anim. Esiane sɛ ɔdwo na ɔde ne ho nyinaa som no no enti, Onyankopɔn tiee no.
Ɛwom sɛ na ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn Ba deɛ, nanso ɔnam nʼamanehunu so suaa ahobrɛaseɛ.
Na ɔwiee pɛyɛ no, wɔn a wɔtie no no nam ne so nya nkwagyeɛ a ɛnni awieeɛ,
na Onyankopɔn ada no adi sɛ ɔyɛ Ɔsɔfopanin sɛdeɛ Melkisedek asɔfokwan nhyehyɛeɛ te no.
Yɛwɔ yei ho nsɛm pii ka, nanso emu kyerɛkyerɛ yɛ den, ɛfiri sɛ, mo nteaseɛ yɛ den.
Moayɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ adwuma no akyɛre, nanso ɛsɛ sɛ monya obi ma ɔkyerɛkyerɛ mo Onyankopɔn ho asɛm firi ne ahyɛaseɛ. Anka ɛsɛ sɛ saa ɛberɛ yi modi aduane a ɛyɛ den, nanso nufosuo na ɛyɛ ma mo.
Obiara a nufosuo yɛ ma no da so yɛ abadomaa a ɔnnim deɛ ɛyɛ ne deɛ ɛnyɛ.
Aduane a ɛyɛ den yɛ ma mpanimfoɔ a wɔatete wɔn na wɔahunu nsonsonoeɛ a ɛda papa ne bɔne ntam.

note.content: Kristo berɛ so no, na ɔsɔfopanin dibea no da abusuakuo bi mu.

block_quote.content: Momma yɛnnyae Kristosom ahyɛaseɛ ho nkyerɛkyerɛ no, na yɛnsua ne ho nsɛm a ɛkɔ anim no. Ɛho nnhia bio sɛ yɛbɛkɔ so akyerɛkyerɛ deɛ enti a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛnu yɛn ho wɔ nneyɛeɛ a ɛde owuo berɛ yɛn ho ne deɛ enti a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛnya Onyankopɔn mu gyidie.
Ɛho nhia bio nso sɛ yɛbɛkɔ so akyerɛkyerɛ asubɔ, nsa a wɔde gu nnipa so, awufosɔreɛ ne daa atemmuo ho nsɛm.
Momma yɛnkɔ yɛn anim! Na sɛ Onyankopɔn ma ɛkwan a, saa ara na yɛbɛyɛ.
Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na wɔbɛsane de wɔn a wɔahwe ase aba ama wɔanu wɔn ho bio? Na anka wɔwɔ Onyankopɔn hann mu. Wɔkaa ɔsoro akyɛdeɛ hwɛeɛ na wɔnyaa wɔn kyɛfa wɔ Honhom Kronkron no mu.
Wɔfiri osuahunu mu ahunu sɛ Onyankopɔn asɛm yɛ, na wɔahunu ewiase a ɛreba no mu tumi.
Nanso, ɛno akyi, wɔhwee ase. Enti, ɛyɛ den sɛ wɔde wɔn bɛsane aba bio sɛ wɔmmɛnu wɔn ho, ɛfiri sɛ, wɔresane abɔ Onyankopɔn Ba no asɛnnua mu nam so agu nʼanim ase akyerɛ.
Onyankopɔn hyira asase a ɛnonom nsuo a ɛtɔ gu so na ɛma ɛso afifideɛ yɛ yie ma wɔn a wɔn enti wɔduaeɛ no.
Na sɛ nkasɛɛ ne wura hunu fifiri so a, ɛnyɛ mma hwee. Onyankopɔn bɛdome no na wɔde ogya asɛe no.
Nanso, me nnamfonom, nsɛm a yɛaka yi nyinaa akyi no, yɛnim pefee sɛ ade pa bi a nkwagyeɛ bata ho bɛfiri mo mu aba.
Onyankopɔn nnyɛ deɛ ɔntene. Ne werɛ remfiri adwuma a moyɛeɛ anaa ɔdɔ a modaa no adi maa no ne mmoa a mode boaa mo mfɛfoɔ Akristofoɔ na mogu so de boa wɔn no.
Deɛ yɛrehwehwɛ ne sɛ mo mu biara bɛboa no mmɔdemmɔ so de akɔsi awieeɛ sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a mo nsa bɛka adeɛ a mo ani da so no.
Yɛmpɛ sɛ moyɛ aniha. Na mmom, yɛpɛ sɛ yɛhunu mo sɛ agyidifoɔ a mowɔ boasetɔ na mo nsa aka bɔ a Onyankopɔn ahyɛ mo no.
Ɛberɛ a Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ Abraham bɔ no, ɔkaa deɛ wahyɛ ho bɔ no ho ntam. Esiane sɛ na obiara nni hɔ a ɔkorɔn sene no no enti, ɔde ɔno ara ne din na ɛkaa saa ntam no.
Ɔkaa ntam no sɛ, “Mehyɛ wo bɔ sɛ, mɛhyira wo na mama wʼase adɔre.”
Na Abraham wɔ boasetɔ enti, ɛbɔ a Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ no no, ne nsa kaeɛ.
Sɛ onipa ka ntam a, ɔde obi a ɔkorɔn sene no din na ɛka saa ntam no de siesie nnipa ntam.
Onyankopɔn pɛɛ sɛ ɔda no adi pefee kyerɛ wɔn a na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔn nsa ka ne bɔhyɛ no sɛ ɔrensesa nʼatirimsɛm, enti ɔkaa ntam de hyɛɛ bɔhyɛ no mu den.
Saa nneɛma mmienu yi na ɛrentumi nsesa na Onyankopɔn ntumi nni ho atorɔ. Enti, yɛn a yɛnam ne so anya nkwa no, wɔhyɛ yɛn nkuran sɛ yɛnkura yɛn anidasoɔ no mu den.
Yɛwɔ saa anidasoɔ yi sɛ ɔkra sɛkyɛ. Ɛtim hɔ, na ɛma yɛhyɛne tra ntwamutam no mu kɔsi Kronkron mu Kronkron hɔ.
Yesu asi yɛn ananmu adi yɛn ɛkan kɔ hɔ. Wayɛ Ɔsɔfopanin afebɔɔ sɛdeɛ Melkisedek asɔfokwan nhyehyɛeɛ te no.
Na saa Melkisedek yi yɛ Salemhene, ɛnna ɔsane yɛ Ɔsorosoro Onyankopɔn ɔsɔfoɔ. Ɛberɛ a Abraham firi ɔko a ɔkumm ahemfo ano reba no, Melkisedek hyiaa no hyiraa no.
Abraham maa no nʼasadeɛ no mu nkyɛmu edu mu baako. Melkisedek din no nkyerɛaseɛ a ɛdi ɛkan no ne Tenenee Ɔhene. Esiane sɛ na ɔyɛ Salemhene no enti, wɔkyerɛɛ ne din no ase sɛ Asomdwoeɛhene.
Obi nnim Melkisedek agya, ne maame, ne ne mpanimfoɔ ho asɛm. Saa ara nso na obi nnim nʼawoɔ ne ne owuo nso ho asɛm. Ɔsɛ Onyankopɔn Ba, na ɔda so yɛ ɔsɔfoɔ daadaa.
Yei di ho adanseɛ sɛ na ɔyɛ onipa kɛseɛ a Agya Abraham mpo tumi ma no nʼasadeɛ mu nkyɛmu edu mu baako.
Nanso, Lewi asefoɔ a wɔyɛ asɔfoɔ no Mmara na ɛhyɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnnye nkyɛmu edu mu baako mfiri wɔn ara wɔn nkurɔfoɔ Israelfoɔ nkyɛn a wɔn nso yɛ Abraham asefoɔ no.
Melkisedek nyɛ Lewi aseni, nanso ɔgyee nkyɛmu edu mu baako firii Abraham nkyɛn hyiraa no maa ɔnyaa Onyankopɔn bɔhyɛ no.
Akyinnyeɛ biara nni ho sɛ deɛ ɔma nhyira so sene deɛ ɔgye nhyira.
Wɔde nnipa akatua nkyɛmu edu mu baako ma asɔfoɔ, nanso asɔfoɔ yi nyinaa wu, gye Melkisedek a Atwerɛsɛm no ka sɛ ɔte ase.
Enti, nokorɛm, Abraham tuaa nkyɛmu edu no, Lewi a nʼasefoɔ gye nkyɛmu edu no nso nam Abraham so tuaa bi maa Melkisedek.
Na wɔnwoo Lewi, nanso ɛsiane sɛ na ɔhyɛ ne nana Abraham mu saa ɛberɛ no a Melkisedek hyiaa no no enti na ɔtuaeɛ.
Ɛnam Lewi asɔfodie so enti na wɔde Mmara no maa Israelfoɔ. Ɛno enti sɛ Lewifoɔ asɔfodie no tumi de pɛyɛ brɛ nnipa a, anka ɛho nhia sɛ wɔbɛfa ɔsɔfoɔ foforɔ bi sɛ Melkisedek a ɔmfiri Aaron abusua mu.
Sɛ ɛba sɛ asɔfodie no sesa a, ɛma ɛho mmara no nso sesa.
Nanso, yɛn Awurade a wɔka saa asɛm yi nyinaa fa ne ho no firi abusua foforɔ mu. Ne busuani biara nnii ɔsɔfoɔ wɔ afɔrebukyia ho da.
Ɛyɛ sɛnnahɔ sɛ wɔwoo no too Yuda abusua mu, na Mose kaa asɔfoɔ ho asɛm no nso, wammɔ nʼabusua din da.
Asɛm no da ne ho adi pefee, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔsɔfoɔ foforɔ bi aba a ɔte sɛ Melkisedek.
Ɔno deɛ, ɛnnam onipa mmara so na wɔhyɛɛ no ɔsɔfoɔ, na mmom wɔnam nkwa a ɛnni awieeɛ tumi so na ɛyɛɛ no ɔsɔfoɔ.
Atwerɛsɛm no ka sɛ,
“Wobɛyɛ ɔsɔfoɔ akɔsi daa
sɛdeɛ Melkisedek asɔfokwan nhyehyɛeɛ te no.”
Wɔato mmara dada no atwene, ɛfiri sɛ, sintɔ bi wɔ mmara no mu, na ɛho nni mfasoɔ nso.
Ɛno enti, Mose Mmara no antumi amma biribiara anyɛ pɛ. Nanso wɔde anidasoɔ pa bi a yɛnam so bɛn Onyankopɔn aba.
Ɛno akyi, Onyankopɔn ntam abɛka ho. Ɛberɛ a ɔhyɛɛ Aaron asefoɔ asɔfoɔ no na ntam a ɛte saa nni hɔ.
Yesu deɛ, ɔnam ntam so bɛyɛɛ ɔsɔfoɔ ɛberɛ a Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ,
“Awurade aka ntam;
na ɔrensesa nʼadwene:
‘Wobɛyɛ ɔsɔfoɔ daa nyinaa.’ ”
Saa ntam yi enti, Yesu gyina mu ma yɛn, na ɛma yɛne Onyankopɔn apam no di mu.
Nsonsonoeɛ foforɔ bi nso wɔ hɔ. Na saa asɔfoɔ no dɔɔso, ɛfiri sɛ, na wɔwuwu a wɔntumi ntoa wɔn adwuma so.
Nanso, Yesu deɛ, ɔwɔ hɔ daa na nʼasɔfodwuma no nso, obi ntoa so mma no.
Enti, ɔtumi gye wɔn a wɔnam ne so ba Onyankopɔn nkyɛn no ɛnnɛ ne daa, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔte hɔ daa srɛ Onyankopɔn ma wɔn.
Yesu ne Ɔsɔfopanin a ɔboa yɛn wɔ yɛn ahiasɛm mu. Ɔyɛ kronkron. Ɔnni mfomsoɔ biara wɔ ne mu, na ɔnyɛ bɔne. Wɔate no afiri nnebɔneyɛfoɔ ho na wɔapagya no aboro ɔsoro so.
Ɔnte sɛ asɔfoɔ mpanin a aka no a, daa afɔrebɔ a ɔbɔ no kane no ɔbɔ wɔ ne bɔne a wayɛ ho ansa na afei, wabɔ afoforɔ deɛ no. Ɔbɔɔ afɔdeɛ baako pɛ a ɔde ne ho na ɛbɔeɛ.
Mose Mmara no yi nnipa a wɔmfata ma wɔyɛ asɔfoɔ mpanin, nanso Onyankopɔn bɔ a ɔde ntam kaa ho no a ɛtaa Mmara no akyi no, yii Ɔba no a ɔyɛ pɛ daa nyinaa no.
Asɛm a yɛgyina so kasa no ne sɛ: Yɛwɔ Ɔsɔfopanin a ɔte Otumfoɔ a ɔwɔ ɔsoro no ahennwa no nifa.
Ɔsom sɛ Ɔsɔfopanin wɔ Kronkronbea hɔ a ɛyɛ ntomadan a ɛwɔ ɔsoro. Saa ntomadan yi, Awurade ankasa na ɔsiiɛ na ɛnyɛ onipa.
Wɔyi Ɔsɔfopanin biara sɛ ɔmfa akyɛdeɛ ne mmoa mmɔ Onyankopɔn afɔdeɛ. Ɛno enti ɛsɛ sɛ yɛn Sɔfopanin nya biribi a ɔde bɛbɔ afɔdeɛ.
Sɛ Yesu wɔ asase so a, anka ɔrenyɛ ɔsɔfoɔ koraa ɛfiri sɛ, asɔfoɔ wɔ hɔ a wɔde afɔrebɔdeɛ ma, sɛdeɛ Yudafoɔ mmara kyerɛ no.

Nanso dwuma a wɔdi sɛ asɔfoɔ no yɛ ɔsoro nsususoɔ bi kwa. Ɛte sɛ Mose berɛ so deɛ no ara pɛ. Ɛberɛ a ɔpɛɛ sɛ ɔsi ntomadan no, Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ, “Si no sɛdeɛ merekyerɛ wo wɔ bepɔ no so pɛpɛɛpɛ.”
Afei deɛ, wɔama Yesu asɔfodwuma a ɛso kyɛn wɔn deɛ no. Yesu yɛ apam a ɛkyɛn so a wɔgyina bɔhyɛ a ɛkyɛn so so hyɛeɛ no ntamgyinafoɔ.
Sɛ na apam a ɛdi ɛkan no yɛ a, anka ɛho nhia sɛ wɔbɛyɛ apam a ɛtɔ so mmienu no.
Nanso, Onyankopɔn hunuu mfomsoɔ wɔ ne nkurɔfoɔ ho ɛberɛ a ɔkaa sɛ,
“Nna bi reba, Awurade na ɔseɛ,
a me ne Israelfoɔ ne Yuda abusuakuo
bɛhyehyɛ apam foforɔ.
Ɛrenyɛ sɛ apam a
me ne wɔn agyanom yɛeɛ no
ɛberɛ a mesɔɔ wɔn nsa
dii wɔn anim firii Misraim no.
Wɔanni apam a me ne wɔn hyehyɛeɛ no ho nokorɛ,
ɛno enti mante mʼani anhwɛ wɔn,
Awurade na ɔseɛ.
Afei, yei ne apam a me ne Israelfoɔ bɛhyehyɛ
ɛberɛ a ɛreba no mu, Awurade na ɔseɛ:
Mede me mmara bɛhyɛ wɔn adwenem
na matwerɛ agu wɔn akoma mu.
Mɛyɛ wɔn Onyankopɔn,
na wɔayɛ me nkurɔfoɔ.
Wɔn mu biara renka nkyerɛ ne yɔnko
anaa ne kuromni sɛ, ‘Hunu Awurade,’
ɛfiri sɛ, wɔn nyinaa bɛhunu me firi
akumaa so kɔsi ɔkɛseɛ so.
Mɛhunu wɔn mmɔbɔ wɔn bɔne ho;
na merenkae wɔn bɔne bio.”
Frɛ a wɔfrɛ saa apam yi “Foforɔ” no ama deɛ wɔyɛɛ kane no ayɛ dada; na biribiara a anyini ayɛ dada no nkyɛre yera.
Na apam a ɛdi ɛkan
no wɔ mmara a wɔnam so som. Saa ara nso na na wɔwɔ beaeɛ a nnipa asiesie a wɔsom.
Wɔsii ntomadan a wɔatwa mu mmienu. Ɛdan a ɛdi ɛkan no a wɔfrɛ no Kronkronbea no na kaneadua, ɛpono ne burodo a wɔate ho a wɔde ma Onyankopɔn no wɔ.
Ntwamu no akyi a wɔfrɛ hɔ Kronkron mu Kronkron no,
na sika aduhwamhyeɛ afɔrebukyia ne Apam Adaka a wɔde sika adura ho nyinaa wɔ. Saa adaka no mu na na sika pɔre a mana ne Aaron poma a ɛfefɛeɛ ne apam abopono no wɔ.
Adaka no so hɔ nso na animuonyam Kerubim a wɔatrɛ wɔn ntaban mu akata Adaka no nkatasoɔ no so si. Nanso, yɛrentumi nka nneɛma yi ho asɛm nkɔ akyiri seesei.
Saa na wɔahyehyɛ nneɛma no. Ɛda biara na asɔfoɔ no kɔ ɛdan a ɛdi ɛkan no mu kɔyɛ wɔn adwuma;
nanso na Ɔsɔfopanin no nko ara na ɔwɔ ho ɛkwan sɛ ɔkɔ Kronkron mu Kronkron hɔ pɛnkorɔ pɛ afe biara. Ɔde mogya a ɔde bɔ ɔno ankasa ne ne nkurɔfoɔ mfomsoɔ ho afɔdeɛ ka ne ho kɔ.
Honhom Kronkron no nam saa ɛkwan yi so kyerɛ yɛn sɛ, wɔnnya mmuee ɛkwan a wɔde kɔ Kronkron mu Kronkron hɔ wɔ ɛberɛ a Ntomadan no ne emu nneɛma da so wɔ hɔ.
Ɛyɛ mfatoho ma ɛnnɛ berɛ yi. Ɛkyerɛ sɛ akyɛdeɛ ne mmoa a na wɔde bɔ afɔdeɛ ma Onyankopɔn no rentumi mma wɔn a wɔsom no akoma mu nyɛ kronn.
Wɔde nnuane, anonneɛ ne nneɛma ahodoɔ a wɔde dwira wɔn ho na ɛdi dwuma no. Yei yɛ ɔhonam fam nhyehyɛeɛ a ɛyɛ adwuma kɔsi ɛberɛ a nhyehyɛeɛ foforɔ bɛba.
Nanso, Kristo aba dada sɛ Ɔsɔfopanin ama nneɛma pa a yɛwɔ dada yi. Ntomadan a ɔsom wɔ mu no so na ɛdi mu kyɛn dada no. Ɛnnyɛ nnipa na wɔyɛeɛ. Afei nso, ɛmmfiri adebɔ yi mu.
Ɛberɛ a Kristo kɔɔ ntomadan no mu a ɔkɔɔ Kronkronbea hɔ pɛnkorɔ no, wamfa mmirekyie ne anantwie mogya na ɛkɔbɔɔ afɔdeɛ. Mmom, ɔno ara de ne mogya na ɛbɔɔ afɔdeɛ de gyee nkwa a ɛnni awieeɛ maa yɛn.
Na sɛ mmirekyie ne anantwinini mogya ne anantwibereɛ nsõ a wɔde dwira wɔn a wɔn ho agu fi te wɔn ho kɔ honam ahofirie mu a,
mpɛn ahe na Kristo a ɔnam Honhom so, de ne ho bɔɔ afɔdeɛ a ɛho nni dɛm maa Onyankopɔn no mogya rente mo ho mfiri nnwuma bɔne mu, na mo nkɔsom Onyankopɔn a ɔte ase no?

Yei enti na Kristo yɛ apam foforɔ no ntamgyinafoɔ sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a, wɔn a Onyankopɔn afrɛ wɔn no bɛnya nhyira a ɛnni awieeɛ sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn ahyɛ bɔ no. Yei aba saa, ɛfiri sɛ, owuo bi asi a ɛgye nnipa firi wɔn bɔne a wɔyɛɛ ɛberɛ a na wɔwɔ apam a ɛdi ɛkan no mu no.
Sɛ nsamanseɛ bi wɔ hɔ a, ɛwɔ sɛ wɔtumi kyerɛ sɛ onipa a ɔhyɛɛ saa samanseɛ no awu.
Sɛ onipa a ɔhyɛɛ nsamanseɛ no te ase a, saa nsamanseɛ no nka hwee. Ɛberɛ a wawu no na ɛka biribi.
Ɛno enti na apam a ɛdi ɛkan no wɔnam mogya so na wɔhyɛɛ no den no.
Deɛ ɛdi ɛkan no, Mose kaa mmaransɛm no nyinaa, sɛdeɛ ɛwɔ Mmara no mu no kyerɛɛ nnipa no. Nantwie mma mogya ne nsuo ne kuntu kɔkɔɔ ne sommɛ na ɔde petee Mmara nwoma no ne nnipa no nyinaa so
kaa sɛ, “Yei ne mogya a ɛsɔ apam a Onyankopɔn ahyɛ mo sɛ monni so no ano.”
Saa ara na Mose petee mogya guu ntomadan no ne nneɛma a wɔde som no nyinaa so ne no.
Nokorɛm, sɛdeɛ Mmara no kyerɛ no, ɛkame ayɛ sɛ mogya na ɛtumi te adeɛ nyinaa ho, na saa ara nso na gye sɛ mogya ahwie agu ansa na bɔnefakyɛ aba.
Saa ɛkwan yi ara so na wɔnam ma biribiara a ɛyɛ ɔsoro nhwɛsodeɛ no ho te. Nanso, ɔsoro nneɛma
no ankasa deɛ, afɔdeɛ a ɛyɛ kyɛn yeinom na wɔde te ho.
Ɛfiri sɛ, Kristo ankɔ baabi a ɛyɛ kronkron a nnipa de wɔn nsa na ayɛ a ɛyɛ ade kann nhwɛsodeɛ. Ɔkɔɔ ɔsoro ankasa na ɔsi yɛn ananmu wɔ hɔ wɔ Onyankopɔn anim.
Afe biara Yudafoɔ Sɔfopanin de aboa mogya kɔ Kronkronbea hɔ. Nanso, Kristo amfa ne ho amma mpɛn bebree saa.
Sɛ ɔyɛɛ saa a, anka ɛfiri adebɔ ahyɛaseɛ no, ɔbɛhunu amane mpɛn bebree. Mmom, waba prɛko a nneɛma nyinaa reba awieeɛ, na ɔnam afɔdeɛ a ɔde ne ho bɔeɛ no so apepa bɔne.
Ɛsɛ sɛ obiara wu prɛko pɛ, na ɛno akyi Onyankopɔn abu no atɛn.
Saa ara na wɔde Kristo nso bɔɔ afɔdeɛ baako pɛ de gyee dodoɔ no ara wɔ wɔn bɔne mu. Ɔbɛba ne mprenu so a ɔmmɛgye nnebɔneyɛfoɔ na mmom, ɔbɛba abɛgye wɔn a wɔretwɛn no no nkwa.

note.content: (8.5) Sɛdeɛ na ɛho hia sɛ wɔde mmoa te kronkron ho no, saa ara nana ɛho hia sɛ ɔsoro kronkron nso, wɔde afɔdeɛ a ɛkyɛn mmoa deɛ a ɛyɛ Yesu Kristo no ankasa no te ho.

block_quote.content: Mmara no yɛ nneɛma pa nsususoɔ a ɛreba, na mmom, ɛnnyɛ nneɛma pa no ankasa. Wɔbɔ afɔdeɛ korɔ no ara afe biara, ɛfiri sɛ saa afɔdeɛ korɔ a wɔbɔ no afeafe rentumi mma nnipa a wɔsom no nnyɛ pɛ da.
Sɛ nnipa a wɔresom Onyankopɔn no tumi firi wɔn bɔne mu yɛ pɛ a, ɛnneɛ anka wɔrenni bɔne ho fɔ bio, na ne saa enti, afɔrebɔ nyinaa to bɛtwa.
Deɛ saa afɔrebɔ yi yɛ ne sɛ, ɛkae wɔn wɔn bɔne afe biara.
Anantwie ne mmirekyie mogya rentumi mpepa bɔne.
Esiane saa enti, ɛberɛ a Kristo rebɛba ewiase no, ɔka kyerɛɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ:
“Wommpɛ afɔrebɔ ne ayɛyɛdeɛ
nanso woasiesie ɔhonam ama me.
Wʼani nnnye
ɔhyeɛ ne bɔne afɔdeɛ anaa afɔdeɛ a wɔbɔ de pepa bɔne ho.
Afei, mekaa sɛ: ‘Mewɔ ha rebɛyɛ deɛ wopɛ sɛ meyɛ
sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ afa me ho wɔ Mmara nwoma no mu no.’ ”
Kane no ɔkaa sɛ, “Wompɛ, na wʼani nso nnnye afɔrebɔ ne ayɛyɛdeɛ a wɔde pepa bɔne ho.” Ɛwom, na Mmara no kyerɛ sɛ wɔnyɛ saa.
Na ɔkaa sɛ, “Mewɔ ha rebɛyɛ deɛ wopɛ sɛ meyɛ.” Ɛno enti, Onyankopɔn agu tete afɔrebɔ no nyinaa na ɔde Kristo afɔrebɔ no asi ananmu.
Esiane sɛ Yesu Kristo yɛɛ sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn hwehwɛ sɛ ɔnyɛ no enti, ɔnam ne honam a ɔde bɔɔ afɔdeɛ prɛko maa yɛn no so ama yɛn ho ate afiri bɔne ho.
Ɛda biara Yudani ɔsɔfoɔ sɔre yɛ nʼasɔfodwuma na wabɔ afɔdeɛ mpɛn bebree. Nanso, saa afɔdeɛ yi rentumi mpepa bɔne.
Kristo deɛ, ɔbɔɔ bɔne ho afɔdeɛ. Afɔdeɛ a ɛtena daa nyinaa. Na ɛno akyi, ɔtenaa Onyankopɔn nifa so.
Ɛhɔ na ɔretwɛn seesei kɔsi sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛma nʼatamfoɔ ayɛ ne nan ntiasoɔ.
Ɔnam afɔrebɔ baako so ama nnebɔneyɛfoɔ ho ate daa nyinaa.
Na Honhom Kronkron no nso di adanseɛ. Deɛ ɛdi ɛkan no, ɔka sɛ,
“Yei ne apam a me ne wɔn bɛpam
wɔ ɛberɛ a ɛreba no mu. Awurade na ɔseɛ:
Mede me mmara bɛhyɛ wɔn akoma mu
na matwerɛ agu wɔn adwene mu.”
Na afei waka sɛ,
“Merenkae wɔn bɔne
ne wɔn amumuyɛ bio.”
Sɛ wɔde yeinom nyinaa kyɛ a, na afɔdeɛ a wɔbɔ de pepa bɔne no ho nhia bio.
Anuanom, ɛsiane Yesu wuo no enti, yɛade yɛn ho koraa sɛ yɛbɛkɔ Kronkronbea hɔ.
Ɔnam ɔno ara ne honam so abue ɛkwan foforɔ a nkwa wɔ mu ama yɛn.
Yɛwɔ ɔsɔfoɔ kɛseɛ bi a ɔhwɛ Onyankopɔn fie so.
Momma yɛmfa akoma pa ne gyidie a emu yɛ den ntwe mmɛn Onyankopɔn. Ɛfiri sɛ wɔde Yesu mmogya ate yɛn atiboa bɔne ho, na wɔde nsuo a ɛyɛ kronn adware yɛn onipadua ho.
Momma yɛnnyina gyidie a yɛasɔ mu no mu denden, ɛfiri sɛ, deɛ ɔhyɛɛ yɛn bɔ no yɛ ɔnokwafoɔ.
Momma yɛn ho yɛn ho asɛm nhia yɛn na yɛnnodɔ yɛn ho yɛn ho na yɛnyɛ papa.
Mommma yɛnnnyae yɛn ho yɛn ho nhyiamu da sɛdeɛ afoforɔ bi yɛ no. Mmom, momma yɛnhyɛ yɛn ho yɛn ho nkuran dendeenden, ɛfiri sɛ, mo ara mohunu sɛ ɛrenkyɛre na ɛda no aba.
Sɛ moboapa kɔ so yɛ bɔne a, afɔrebɔ biara nni hɔ a ɛbɛpepa mo bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ, wɔada nokorɛ no adi akyerɛ yɛn.
Deɛ ɛwɔ hɔ ara ma wɔn a wɔtia Onyankopɔn ne atemmuo ne ogya a ɛbɛba abɛhye wɔn.
Obiara a ɔbu Mose Mmara no so no, sɛ adansefoɔ baanu anaa baasa adansedie enti, wɔbu atɛn tia no a, wɔbɛkum no a wɔrenhunu no mmɔbɔ.

Na obi a watiatia Onyankopɔn Ba no so, na ɔmmfa Onyankopɔn mogya apam no a ɛgyee no firii bɔne mu no nyɛ hwee anaa deɛ ɔtiatia Honhom a ɔma adom no anim no, ɛdeɛn na ɛbɛto no? Asotwe a onii no bɛnya no nnyɛ adewa.
Yɛnim sɛ Onyankopɔn kaa sɛ, “Me na aweretɔ wɔ me, na me na metua ka,” na ɔno ara na ɔsane kaa sɛ, “Awurade bɛbu ne nkurɔfoɔ atɛn.”
Onyankopɔn a ɔte ase no nsam amanenya yɛ hu.
Monkae ahohia a mokɔɔ mu ɛberɛ a mohunuu hann no, momiaa mo ani hunuu ɔko bebree mu amaneɛ.
Ebi ne sɛ, mpɛn bebree wɔyeyɛɛ mo, guu mo anim ase badwam; na ɛtɔ da bi mpo a, na moasiesie mo ho sɛ mobɛka wɔn a wɔrehunu amaneɛ no ho.
Mo ne nneduafoɔ daa afiase na wɔfaa mo ahodeɛ nyinaa no mpo, monyaa ho boasetɔ, ɛfiri sɛ, monim sɛ ɛyɛ dɛn ara a mowɔ ade pa bi a ɛbɛtena hɔ daa.
Mommma mo akoma nntu na moanhwere mo akatua.
Ɛsɛ sɛ moto mo bo ase na moatumi ayɛ Onyankopɔn apɛdeɛ ama mo nsa aka deɛ wɔahyɛ mo ho bɔ no.
Ɛfiri sɛ,
Atwerɛsɛm no ka sɛ, “Ɛrenkyɛre koraa
na deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ ɔba no aba;
ɔrentwentwɛn.
Na,
“Deɛ ɔtene no firi gyidie mu bɛnya nkwa,
na sɛ ɔtwe ne ho a,
me kra ani rensɔ no.”
Yɛnnyɛ nnipa a yɛsane yɛn akyi na yɛyera. Mmom, yɛwɔ gyidie na wɔagye yɛn nkwa.
Gyidie yɛ ahotosoɔ a yɛwɔ wɔ nneɛma a yɛn ani da so ne awerɛhyɛmu a yɛwɔ wɔ nneɛma a yɛn ani nnhunu mu.
Gyidie a na tetefoɔ no wɔ enti na wɔnyaa adanseɛ pa.
Gyidie na ɛma yɛte aseɛ sɛ ɛnam Onyankopɔn asɛm so na wɔbɔɔ ewiase. Ɛma yɛhunu sɛ wɔbɔɔ deɛ wɔhunu firii deɛ wɔnnhunu mu.

Ɛnam gyidie so na Habel bɔɔ afɔdeɛ a ɛsɔ ani kyɛn deɛ Kain de maa Onyankopɔn no. Ne gyidie enti, Onyankopɔn buu no sɛ onipa tenenee, na nʼakyɛdeɛ no sɔɔ Onyankopɔn ani. Na ɛno so na ɔnam wuiɛ a ɛnnɛ mpo ɔda so kasa.
Gyidie enti, wɔfaa Henok kɔɔ ɔsoro a wanhunu owuo. Obiara anhunu no, ɛfiri sɛ, Onyankopɔn na ɔfaa no kɔeɛ. Atwerɛsɛm no ka sɛ ansa na wɔrebɛfa Henok akɔ no, na wasɔ Onyankopɔn ani.
Obiara a ɔnni gyidie rentumi nsɔ Onyankopɔn ani. Ɛsɛ sɛ obiara a ɔba Onyankopɔn nkyɛn no nya gyidie sɛ Onyankopɔn te ase na ɔdom wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ no.

Gyidie enti na ɛmaa Noa tee Onyankopɔn kɔkɔ a ɔbɔ faa daakye nneɛma a ebi nsii da no, ɔtiee Onyankopɔn yɛɛ adaka a emu na wɔgyee ɔno ne ne fiefoɔ nkwa. Ɛnam so maa Onyankopɔn buu ewiase fɔ, na Noa deɛ, ne nsa kaa tenenee a wɔnya firi gyidie mu.
Gyidie enti na ɛberɛ a Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ Abraham sɛ ɔnkɔ asase a wahyɛ ho bɔ sɛ ɔde bɛma no so no, ɔtieeɛ na ɔkɔeɛ. Ɔgyaa ne ɔman hɔ kɔeɛ a na ɔnnim baabi a ɔrekɔ.
Gyidie enti ɔtenaa asase a na Onyankopɔn ahyɛ no ho bɔ no so sɛ ɔhɔhoɔ. Ɔne Isak ne Yakob a Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ wɔn bɔ korɔ no ara bi tenaa ntomadan mu.
Nanso, na Abraham retwɛn kuro kɛseɛ bi a Onyankopɔn akyekyere a ne fapem rensɛe da mu akɔtena.
Gyidie enti na Sara nso de nyaa tumi nyinsɛnee, ɛberɛ a na wanyini na ɔntumi nwo no. Ɔde ne ho too Onyankopɔn so sɛ ɔbɛdi ne bɔhyɛ so.
Ɛno enti, ɛwom sɛ na Abraham regye nna awu, nanso nʼasefoɔ adɔɔso sɛ ewiem nsoromma ne mpoano anwea.
Gyidie mu na saa nnipa yi nyinaa wuwuiɛ. Ɛwom sɛ wɔn nsa anka bɔ a Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ wɔn no deɛ, nanso wɔhunuu no akyirikyiri yɛɛ no atuu, gye dii sɛ wɔyɛ ahɔhoɔ ne amamfrafoɔ wɔ asase so.
Wɔn a wɔka saa no da no adi pefee sɛ wɔrehwehwɛ wɔn ankasa wɔn ɔman.
Wɔannwene ɔman a wɔgyaa wɔ wɔn akyire no ho. Sɛ wɔyɛɛ no saa a, anka wɔbɛtumi anya ɛkwan asane wɔn akyi akɔ hɔ.
Na mmom, ɔman pa a ɛyɛ ɔsoro ɔman no na na wɔpere kɔ mu. Enti, ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn aniwu sɛ ɔma wɔfrɛ no wɔn Onyankopɔn, ɛfiri sɛ, wasiesie ɔman bi ama wɔn.
Gyidie enti, Abraham de ne ba Isak kɔbɔɔ afɔdeɛ ɛberɛ a Onyankopɔn sɔɔ no hwɛeɛ. Abraham nko ara ne onipa a na Onyankopɔn ahyɛ no bɔ no, nanso na wasiesie ne ho sɛ, ɔde ne ba korɔ no bɛbɔ afɔdeɛ.
Na Onyankopɔn aka akyerɛ no sɛ, “Ɛnam Isak so na wʼase bɛtrɛ.”
Na Abraham nim sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛtumi anyane awufoɔ afiri owuo mu, na ɛkwan bi so no, yɛbɛtumi aka sɛ Onyankopɔn nyanee Isak firii owuo mu.
Gyidie enti na ɛmaa Isak hyiraa Yakob ne Esau maa wɔn daakye asetena.
Gyidie enti na ɛmaa Yakob hyiraa Yosef mma no nyinaa ansa na ɔrewuo. Ɔkuraa ne poma mu sɔree Onyankopɔn.
Gyidie enti na Yosef rebɛwuo no, ɔka kyerɛɛ Israelfoɔ sɛ, wɔbɛtu afiri Misraim, na ɔhyɛɛ deɛ sɛ ɔwu a, wɔnyɛ nʼamu no.
Gyidie enti na ɛmaa Mose awoɔ akyi no, nʼawofoɔ de no siee abosome mmiɛnsa no. Wɔhunuu sɛ na ɔyɛ sononko, enti na wɔansuro sɛ wɔbɛbu ɔhene no mmara so.
Gyidie enti na Mose nyiniiɛ no, wampɛ sɛ wɔbɛfrɛ no Farao babaa ba no.
Na ɔpɛ sɛ ɔne Onyankopɔn mma bɛhunu amane sene sɛ ɔbɛgye nʼani wɔ bɔne mu mmerɛ tiawa bi.
Ɔsusuu sɛ, sɛ ɔhunu amane ma Kristo a, ɛyɛ sene agyapadeɛ a ɛwɔ Misraim nyinaa, ɛfiri sɛ, na nʼani da ade pa bi so daakye.
Gyidie enti na ɛmaa Mose tu firii Misraim a na ɔnsuro ɔhene no abufuo. Ɔmiaa nʼani sɛ ɔrensane nʼakyi ɛfiri sɛ na wahunu Onyankopɔn a obi nhunu no no.
Gyidie enti na ɔhyɛɛ Twam Afahyɛ no ma wɔde mogya petee apono ho, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a, ɔsɛebɔfoɔ no renkum Israelfoɔ mmakan a wɔyɛ mmarima no.
Gyidie enti na ɛmaa Israelfoɔ no twaa Ɛpo Kɔkɔɔ no, sɛdeɛ wɔnam asase kesee so no. Misraimfoɔ no pɛɛ sɛ wɔtwa bi no, nsuo no bu faa wɔn so.
Gyidie enti na Israelfoɔ de nnanson twaa Yeriko afasuo ho hyiaeɛ no, ɛdwiri guiɛ.
Gyidie enti na wɔankum adwaman Rahab amfra wɔn a wɔnnye Onyankopɔn nni no, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔgyee akwansrafoɔ no fɛ so.
Afei ɛdeɛn na menka? Ɛberɛ bebree nni hɔ sɛ mɛka Gideon, Barak, Samson, Yefta, Dawid ne Samuel ne adiyifoɔ no ho asɛm.
Wɔnam gyidie so koo aman dii nkonim ma wɔn nsa kaa deɛ Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ wɔn ho bɔ no. Wɔkataa gyata ano,
dumm ogyaframa, tetee wɔn ho firii akofenawuo ano. Na wɔyɛ mmerɛ, nanso wɔyɛɛ den. Na wɔyɛ den akono, enti wɔdii wɔn atamfoɔ so.

Ɛnam gyidie so ma wɔnyanee mmaa bi awufoɔ maa wɔn. Afoforɔ bi nso, wɔyɛɛ wɔn aniɛyadeɛ sɛ anka wɔmpo Onyankopɔn na wɔagyaa wɔn. Nanso, wɔammpo Onyankopɔn, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔn nsa bɛka daakye owusɔreɛ a ɛkyɛn so.
Wɔguu afoforɔ anim ase, bɔɔ wɔn mmaa, na wɔkyekyeree ebinom de wɔn guu afiase.
Wɔsii ebi aboɔ. Wɔde sradaa paee ebinom mu mmienu, de sekan kumm bi. Wɔkyinkyinii sɛ nnipa a nnwan ne mmirekyie nhoma kata wɔn ho. Wɔyɛɛ mmɔbɔ. Wɔn ho dwanee wɔn na wɔhunuu amane.
Ewiase yi annyɛ amma wɔn. Wɔkyinkyinii sɛ atutenafoɔ wɔ ɛserɛ so ne mmepɔ so, abodan ne asase so abɔn mu.
Wɔdii yeinom nyinaa ho adanseɛ pa wɔ wɔn gyidie ho, nanso wɔn nsa anka bɔ a Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ wɔn no,
ɛfiri sɛ, Onyankopɔn wɔ tirimupɔ papa bi ma yɛn, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛne wɔn nyinaa bɛbom anya bɔhyɛ no.
Yɛn deɛ, yɛwɔ adansefoɔ bebree a wɔatwa yɛn ho ahyia. Momma yɛntwe yɛn ho mfiri akwansideɛ nyinaa ne bɔne a akyekyere yɛn dendeenden no nyinaa ho na yɛnyere yɛn ho wɔ mmirikakansie a ɛda yɛn anim no.

Momma yɛmfa yɛn ani nto Yesu a yɛn gyidie ahyɛaseɛ ne nʼawieeɛ gyina ne so no so. Asɛnnua no enti, wampa aba. Esiane anigyeɛ a na ɛretwɛn no no enti, animguasewuo a ɔwuu wɔ asɛnnua so no anha no. Enti, seesei ɔte Onyankopɔn ahennwa no nifa so.
Dwene ɔhaw a ɔfaa mu no ho sɛ nnipa nnebɔneyɛfoɔ tan a wɔtanee no nso, ɔtumi gyinaa ano no. Ɛno enti mommpa aba.
Na mo ne bɔne ko mu no, monnko nkɔduruu sɛ mobɛhwie mogya agu.
Mo werɛ afiri nkuranhyɛsɛm a Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ mo sɛ ne mma no sɛ,
“Me ba, sɛ Awurade tene wo so a, tie no yie,
na sɛ ɔka wʼanim a, mpa aba.
Ɛfiri sɛ, obiara a Awurade pɛ nʼasɛm no, ɔtwe nʼaso,
sɛdeɛ agya tene ɔba a ɔdɔ no so no.”
Amanehunu biara a ɛbɛto mo no, monnhinhim na momfa no sɛ Agya no ntenesoɔ, ɛfiri sɛ, mo amanehunu no kyerɛ ntenesoɔ a Onyankopɔn retene mo so sɛ ne mma. Ɔba bi wɔ hɔ a nʼagya ntene ne so da?
Sɛ wantene mo so sɛ ne mma no bi a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ monnyɛ ne mma kann.
Sɛ yɛn agyanom a wɔwɔ asase so twee yɛn aso maa yɛbuu wɔn a, mpɛn ahe na ɛnsɛ sɛ yɛbrɛ yɛn ho ase ma honhom mu Agya no na yɛtumi tena ase?
Yɛn agyanom a wɔwɔ asase so ha twee yɛn aso sɛdeɛ wɔpɛ ɛberɛ tiawa bi. Nanso, yɛn yiedie enti, Onyankopɔn yɛɛ saa sɛdeɛ yɛn ho bɛte.
Sɛ wɔtwe yɛn aso a, ɛma yɛn werɛ ho saa ɛberɛ no mu, na yɛn ani nnye. Na akyire no, wɔn a wɔfa saa asotwe no mu na wɔnya wɔn ho nteaseɛ no, wɔnya asomdwoeɛ na wɔtena ase tenenee mu.
Montenetene nsa ne nkotodwe a emu agogo no mu.
Monsiesie akwan na momfa so, na mpakye anyɛ mmubuafoɔ, na mmom, wɔasa wɔn yadeɛ.
Mo ne nnipa nyinaa ntena ase asomdwoeɛ mu, na mommɔ mmɔden ntena ase tenenee mu. Anyɛ saa a, morenhunu Awurade.
Monhwɛ yie na mo mu bi annane nʼakyi ankyerɛ Onyankopɔn adom no. Monhwɛ yie na mo mu bi anyɛ sɛ afifideɛ a ɛyɛ nwono a ɛnyini ma ne bɔnwoma no ha afoforɔ.
Monhwɛ yie na mo mu bi anyɛ odwamanfoɔ ne obi a ɔmfɛre Onyankopɔn sɛ Esau a ɔbuu nʼani guu nʼagyapadeɛ so tɔnee nʼabakan de gyee aduane no.
Na afei ɛduruu ɛberɛ bi a ɔpɛɛ sɛ ne nsa ka nʼagya hɔ nhyira no, ɔde kamee no no. Ɛwom sɛ ɔde nisuo peree sɛ wanya adwensakyera deɛ, nanso anyɛ yie.
Monhyiaa nneɛma a ɛyɛ hu, ogyaframa, awerɛhoɔ, esum ne ahum sɛdeɛ Israelfoɔ no hyiaa Sinai Bepɔ no so ɛberɛ a Onyankopɔn de ne mmara no maeɛ no.
Ɛfiri sɛ, na wɔrebɔ totorobɛnto dendeenden a ɛnne bi a ɛreka kasa a ɛyɛ hu nenam mu, enti nnipa no srɛɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ ɔnnyae kasa,
ɛfiri sɛ, na wɔntumi nni mmara a na ɛka sɛ, “Sɛ mpo aboa koraa de ne ho ka bepɔ no a, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔsi no aboɔ kum no” no so.
Na beaeɛ hɔ yɛ hu ara kɔsii sɛ Mose kaa sɛ. “Mesuro, na me ho popo.”
Na mo deɛ moaba Sion Bepɔ so ne Onyankopɔn a ɔte ase no kuro, ɔsorosoro Yerusalem a ɔsoro abɔfoɔ mpempem wɔ mu no mu.
Moaba Onyankopɔn asafo mma dada a wɔn ani gye wɔn ho a wɔatwerɛ wɔn din wɔ ɔsoro no mu. Moaba Onyankopɔn a ɔyɛ nnipa nyinaa ɔtemmufoɔ ne ateneneefoɔ a wɔayɛ wɔn pɛ no mu.
Moaba Yesu a ɔhyehyɛɛ apam foforɔ ne mogya a wɔapete a ɛka nneɛma pa ho asɛm sene Habel mogya no ho.
Monhwɛ mo ho so yie na moammu mo ani angu asɛm a ɔka so. Wɔn a wɔantie deɛ ɔkasa firii asase so no amfa wɔn ho anni. Na ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yɛatumi adwane afiri deɛ ɔkasa firi ɔsoro no ho?
Ne nne wosoo asase saa ɛberɛ no, nanso seesei wahyɛ bɔ sɛ, “Ɛnyɛ asase nko na mɛsane awoso no, na mɛwoso soro nso bio saa ara.”
Nsɛm “Nso bio saa ara” no da no adi pefee sɛ ɔbɛwoso nneɛma a wɔbɔeɛ no na atutu afiri wɔn ananmu na nneɛma a wɔntumi nwoso no aka.
Momma yɛnna so ase, ɛfiri sɛ, yɛanya ahennie a wɔwoso no a ɛnyɛ yie. Momma yɛn ani nsɔ na yɛmfa ɛkwan a ɛbɛsɔ Onyankopɔn ani a ɛyɛ anidie ne suro so nsom no,
ɛfiri sɛ, nokorɛ ni, yɛn Onyankopɔn yɛ ogya a ɛhye na ɛsɛe adeɛ.
Monnodɔ mo ho mo ho sɛ anuanom wɔ Kristo mu.
Monkae na monnye ahɔhoɔ wɔ mo afie mu. Ebinom yɛɛ saa nam so gyee abɔfoɔ a na wɔnnim.
Monkae wɔn a wɔda afiase na momfa no sɛ mo ne wɔn na ɛda hɔ. Monkae wɔn a wɔrehunu amane na momfa no sɛ mo ne wɔn na ɛrehunu saa amane no.
Mo nyinaa nni awadeɛ ni, na okununom ne ɔyerenom nni wɔn ho nokorɛ, ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛbu adwamanfoɔ ne awaresɛefoɔ atɛn.
Monyi sikanibereɛ mfiri mo abrabɔ mu, na momma mo ani nsɔ deɛ mo nsa ka. Ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn aka sɛ,
“Merennya wo,
na merennya wo da.”
Momma yɛnsi yɛn bo nka sɛ,
“Awurade ne me ɔboafoɔ, enti merensuro.
Ɛdeɛn na onipa bɛtumi ayɛ me?”
Monkae mo mpanimfoɔ a wɔdii mo anim a wɔkaa Onyankopɔn asɛm kyerɛɛ mo no. Monkae ɛkwan a wɔfaa so tenaa ase na monsua wɔn gyidie no.
Yesu Kristo te saa ara nnora, ɛnnɛ ne daa nyinaa.

Mommma nkyerɛkyerɛ foforɔ biara nntwe mo mmfiri ɛkwan pa so. Ɛyɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn adom enti, yɛn kra bɛnyini ahoɔden so a ɛmfiri aduane ho mmara a yɛdi so no. Wɔn a wɔdi mmara a ɛte saa so no nnya mmoa biara.
Nanso yɛwɔ afɔrebukyia bi a Asɔfoɔ a wɔsom wɔ Ahyiaeɛ Ntomadan mu no mpo nni ho ɛkwan sɛ wɔdidi so.
Yudafoɔ Sɔfopanin de mmoa mogya ba Kronkron mu Kronkron hɔ de bɛbɔ bɔne afɔdeɛ nanso wɔhye mmoa no funu wɔ beaeɛ no akyi baabi.
Yei enti, Yesu nso wuu wɔ kuro no ɛpono akyi sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a ne mogya bɛma nnipa ayɛ kronkron.
Enti momma yɛnkɔ ne nkyɛn wɔ beaeɛ no akyi nkɔgye animguaseɛ no bi.
Ɛfiri sɛ, yɛnni atenaeɛ a ɛwɔ hɔ daa wɔ asase yi so. Yɛrehwehwɛ kuro a ɛrebɛba no akyiri ɛkwan.
Momma yɛmfa Yesu so mfa yɛn anofafa nkamfo Onyankopɔn din daa sɛ yɛn afɔrebɔdeɛ.
Mommma mo werɛ mfiri sɛ mobɛyɛ mo ho mo ho papa aboaboa mo ho mo ho, ɛfiri sɛ, ɛno ne afɔrebɔ a ɛsɔ Onyankopɔn ani.

Montie mo mpanimfoɔ na monni wɔn asɛm so. Esiane sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wɔbu wɔn adwuma ho akonta enti, wɔhwɛ mo kra so a wɔnhome koraa. Sɛ motie wɔn a, wɔde anigyeɛ bɛyɛ wɔn adwuma. Sɛ anyɛ saa a wɔde awerɛhoɔ bɛyɛ adwuma no na ɛremmoa mo.
Monkɔ so mmɔ mpaeɛ mma yɛn. Yɛnim pefee sɛ yɛwɔ adwene a emu da hɔ, ɛfiri sɛ, yɛpɛ sɛ ɛberɛ biara yɛyɛ adeɛ a ɛyɛ.
Na mebɔ mpaeɛ kɔ so srɛ mo sɛ, mommɔ mpaeɛ na Onyankopɔn mfa me mmrɛ mo nnansa yi ara.
Onyankopɔn anyane yɛn Awurade Yesu a ɔyɛ odwanhwɛfoɔ panin no afiri awufoɔ mu ama yɛn na ɛnam ne owuo no so enti, wɔasɔ daa apam no ano ama yɛn.
Asomdwoeɛ Onyankopɔn mma mo deɛ ɛhia mo nyinaa na monam so ayɛ nʼapɛdeɛ, na ɔnam Yesu Kristo so ayɛ yɛn mu adwuma sɛdeɛ ɛsɔ ani. Animuonyam nka Kristo daa nyinaa. Amen.
Anuanom, mesrɛ mo sɛ, monyɛ aso ntie nkuranhyɛ nsɛm yi, ɛfiri sɛ, saa krataa a matwerɛ mo yi nnyɛ tenten biara.
Mepɛ sɛ mebɔ mo amaneɛ sɛ wɔayi yɛn nua Timoteo afiri afiase. Sɛ ɔba ntɛm a, me ne no bɛba mo nkyɛn.
Yɛkyea mpanimfoɔ no ne Onyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ no nyinaa.
Anuanom a wɔwɔ Italia no kyea mo.
Adom nka mo nyinaa.
